definition: to contend for hegemony/a power struggle
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
variant of 霸[ba4]
hegemon/tyrant/lord/feudal chief/to rule by force/to usurp/(in modern advertising) master
StarCraft (video game series) (Tw)
StarCraft (video game series)

sentences.english: Bo Pi is an important person in the late Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 伯喜否是春秋后期吴越争霸史上的重要人物之一。

sentences.english: The RTS (real time strategy) video game genre has been defined by this game.
sentences.chinese: 星际争霸是即时战略游戏的代表。

sentences.english: Never mind the two-party U.S.-Soviet moon race of old.
sentences.chinese: 忘记以前登月竞赛的美苏争霸吧。

sentences.english: KL:Will you stop play starcraft, when Warcraft 3 come out?
sentences.chinese: 当魔兽争霸3发行后你还会玩星际吗？

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Periods, the county system grew with the development of wars.
sentences.chinese: 在春秋时期的争霸和征服战争中，县制发展起来。

sentences.english: Macro and Micro in Starcraft was an important factor of the game.
sentences.chinese: 星际争霸当中的宏操与微操都非常重要。

sentences.english: Can you imagine TRON in 3 dimensions?
sentences.chinese: 你能想象三维的“电子世界争霸赛”吗？

sentences.english: Did you watch the World Boxing Championship yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 昨天你看了世界拳王争霸赛了吗？

sentences.english: Confidence in yourself is the first step on the road to succe .
sentences.chinese: 自信是走向成七雄争霸怎么过重楼功的第一步。

sentences.english: Did you watch the World’s Boxing Championship yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 你看了昨天的世界拳王争霸赛了吗？

sentences.english: Harry gets put in the Triwizard Tournament. With dragons and mermaids.
sentences.chinese: 哈利被陷害参加了三强争霸赛，关卡中有龙有人鱼。

sentences.english: He wanted to be Captain Kirk in Star Trek.
sentences.chinese: 他想要成为星际争霸战里的寇克舰长。

sentences.english: For the first time in a while, social media is a two-horse race.
sentences.chinese: 几年来，社交媒体领域头一回开始了双龙争霸的局面。

sentences.english: Warcraft III will now write its registry keys on launch.
sentences.chinese: 魔兽争霸III现在将在启动时自动写入注册表数据。

sentences.english: It was one of seven states that had been warring for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 当时，七国争霸，常年战乱，秦是其中一国。

sentences.english: Recently, Kuala Lumper beat Chicago in a battle of skyscrapers.
sentences.chinese: 最近吉隆坡在一场摩天大楼的争霸中击败了芝加哥。

definition: lit. to proclaim oneself hegemon/to take a leading role/to build a personal fiefdom
to contend for supremacy
great heroes pursue deer in the central plains (idiom); fig. many vie for supremacy
a powerful chief of the princes of the Spring and Autumn Period (770-476 BC)/overlord/hegemon
lit. hunting deer in the Central Plain (idiom)/fig. to attempt to seize the throne
civil war
to pursue deer/fig. to vie for supremacy
internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
Vertical and Horizontal Alliance, opposing stratagems devised by the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
to strive
to unify/unified
the task of establishing and maintaining hegemony
to have a show-down/to fight for mastery/to compete for a championship
to vie against one another/to fight each other/mutual aggression
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
war/to wage war
